about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a boundless adventure at the heart of Etera extraordinary journey through an imaginary world.

You have to overcome many obstacles in this side scroller adventure, while finding yourself in scenarios rich in detail and complexity, where the thin line between reality and fantasy dissolves.

Measure your skill in timing, coordination, and strategy as you carefully plan each move to reach the end of your journey.

Each level will be unique, with intricate tracks that require agility and quick reflexes.
You'll be constantly challenged by new obstacles and traps that will try to stop you on your way to the end.

Navigate through environments so realistic they seem tangible, yet surreal enough to capture your imagination with a unique blend of familiar and unexpected elements.

Every moment will mark the pace of your quest, influencing the plot and direction of your journey.
Face challenges in a mutable timeline, where the past and the future intertwine.

Indulge in the luxury of experiencing the magic of never-before-seen worlds, where climatic adversities become either a precious ally or a insidious adversary.

Climb, run, and reach the highest peaks. Take on the challenge and discover what is your purpose inside Etera!

name: Etera

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5 6400 / AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5 6500 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / AMD RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: What is your purpose inside Etera?
